claim: The Eiffel Tower was completed in 1889 and is located in Paris, France
description: Simple historical fact with two verifiable subclaims

claim: Albert Einstein was born in Germany in 1879 and won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921
The Great Wall of China is visible from space and was built in the 5th century BC
description: Mixed truth - second part is true, first part is a myth

claim: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level
The Python programming language was created by Guido van Rossum and first released in 1991
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain on Earth and is located in Nepal
description: Partially correct - Everest is tallest but on Nepal/China border

claim: The Earth orbits the Sun and completes one orbit every 365.25 days
William Shakespeare wrote Hamlet and was born in Stratford-upon-Avon in 1564
The COVID-19 pandemic started in 2019 and vaccines were developed within one year
The human brain contains approximately 100 billion neurons
